plot: Troubled by the fact that she is still a virgin and doesn't want her fiance to deflower her, a 19-year-old German teenager takes off to the big city for an operation.
title: Engelchen - oder die Jungfrau von Bamberg
plot_es: Troubled by the fact that she is still a virgin and doesn't want her fiance to deflower her, a 19-year-old German teenager takes off to the big city for an operation.
original_name: Engelchen - oder die Jungfrau von Bamberg
plot_en: Troubled by the fact that she is still a virgin and doesn't want her fiance to deflower her, a 19-year-old German teenager takes off to the big city for an operation.
